p: Another recent reported study suggested that Axl receptor (a tyrosine kinase, originated from a Greek word anexelekto, meaning uncontrolled) to be a target for discovery of compounds against ZIKV infection [ 137]. The inhibitors for the receptor seem to function by inhibiting Axl receptor dimerization considered crucial for virus entry. Sarukhanyan et al. experimentally validated the hypothesis by demonstrating anti-ZIKV activities of compounds such as warfarin and a few similar structural analogues identified using in silico methods [ 106]. Although Axl is thought to mediate viral attachment to the host cells, the absolute mechanism of function is not fully understood [ 138].
